comments:
When modifying a plugin.xml in an empty plugin project with no code, a
java.lang.NullPointerException is thrown by org.eclipse.pde.ui at the final step
of the org.eclipse.help.toc wizard when one selects the help sample template.
This problem is not evident when using build 3.0.2. Changing the manifest type
to 3.0 has no effect.

please paste the NPE and indicate the build id as it appears in the Help > 
About... dialog.

The error is the same in both windows and Linux. Here is the Linux GTK version:

The problem is that the template was being generated before the plugin.xml 
gets created.
